segments.text: totally agree with them they should not bought any any car zone for motor cars because it causes a lot of pollution and cause destroying for the environment not only that I mean if you come to this beautiful small city or the midtown or the downtown you can see that there are a lot of pollution sometimes you cannot even breathe when you want to because of the pollution
